LABEL: 0xCD
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0xDD
STRING: Is this dream, or reality?

LABEL: 0x16A
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x17A
STRING: The boundaries between the two are blurred, leading to one possibility.

LABEL: 0x213
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x223
STRING: Another future for these women may have bloomed somewhere else.

LABEL: 0x2BE
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x2CE
STRING: There's a fragment of Daffodil here. There's a crazy, human side to her.

LABEL: 0x371
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x381
STRING: Let's look into that fragment.

LABEL: 0x5A5
STRING: One day, I was attending a live concert.

LABEL: 0x5F5
STRING: It's apparently a festival or some such, a large-scale event with a variety of bands and groups performing.

LABEL: 0x66F
STRING: Looking around me, I saw lots of people holding flags and special shirts, dressed for the occasion.

LABEL: 0x6EA
STRING: I, on the other hand, was dressed in my normal clothes.

LABEL: 0x72A
STRING: I hardly know any of the bands playing here. This is my first time attending one.

LABEL: 0x7BA
STRING: So what am I doing here...?

LABEL: 0x7FD
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x80D
STRING: Oh, hey there. You're early, did I keep you waiting?

LABEL: 0x85F
STRING: I looked up at the voice calling to me.

LABEL: 0x8F6
STRING: There stood my favorite person... Ayume, as beautiful as ever.

LABEL: 0xA4B
STRING: The story begins a few weeks ago. I had been going to a bar to meet Ayume.

LABEL: 0xB0E
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0xB1E
STRING: Huh. Boy, you sure have a lot of patience.

LABEL: 0xBB7
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0xBC7
STRING: I told you you shouldn't have come to see me... I guess it's true: Love is blind.

LABEL: 0xC43
STRING: %ZAyume, after telling me to not seek her out, suddenly returned to the bar.

LABEL: 0xCBA
STRING: Apparently, Ayume knew I was still going there.

LABEL: 0xD1F
STRING: I was a little hurt that she knew and ignored me, but I was quite happy to see her.

LABEL: 0xDF4
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0xE04
STRING: Why you look so happy? Like a little puppy.

LABEL: 0xEA1
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0xEB1
STRING: Coming here means you still have feelings for me. In that case...

LABEL: 0xF69
STRING: Ayume then brings her face close to mine.

LABEL: 0xFC5
STRING: Our eyes meet up perfectly. Oh, she's so close! This is making me nervous...!

LABEL: 0x107A
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x108A
STRING: Wow. You're blushing... So cute, boy.

LABEL: 0x112B
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x113B
STRING: I'll give you a reward for being such a brave boy - I'll give you a date.

LABEL: 0x12BC
STRING: ...And so, we arrive to the present.

LABEL: 0x12FE
STRING: I never thought I'd get to date Ayume! I should make the most of this opportunity!

LABEL: 0x136E
STRING: I've never been to a concert, but now it's like a theme park! I'm so excited!

LABEL: 0x1440
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x1450
STRING: You look like you have fun, boy. Are you that happy to date me?

LABEL: 0x14F1
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x1501
STRING: But... don't forget your promise, okay? After today's date, you're not going to get involved with me anymore.

LABEL: 0x157D
STRING: ...Oh, that's right. This date was possible because I accepted her promise.

LABEL: 0x15EB
STRING: After today, I will never see Ayume again.

LABEL: 0x1641
STRING: Even if I refuse, there's no guarantee I'll see Ayume in the future.

LABEL: 0x16B7
STRING: That's why... I accepted her offer.

LABEL: 0x1713
STRING: But why here, at a live concert?

LABEL: 0x175B
STRING: I'm sure there were other places.

LABEL: 0x17EC
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x17FC
STRING: Ordinary places are fun too, but I thought I might as well let my boy know about the things I like. ...Or was it no a good idea?

LABEL: 0x1892
STRING: Oh, that mocking superiority again...!

LABEL: 0x18E0
STRING: I make sure to tell her I'm happy to know.

LABEL: 0x1999
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x19A9
STRING: I'm glad to hear that! I'll tell you about the performers, so don't worry about the people around you, and just enjoy yourself, okay?

LABEL: 0x1A2F
STRING: Ayume told me, while smiling.

LABEL: 0x1A8B
STRING: Hm? I'm sure I've seen Ayume smile before, but this one was different than the ones she's had before.

LABEL: 0x1B60
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x1B70
STRING: Hey, it's about it start. The first band isâ€•

LABEL: 0x1C5A
STRING: Ayume gives me a commentary on the performers.

LABEL: 0x1CA8
STRING: ...And then the live show began.

LABEL: 0x1CEC
STRING: The audience's voices raised at that moment, along with the sounds from the stage.

LABEL: 0x1D4E
STRING: My breath was caught in my throat as I was confronted with a sight I had never seen before, a sight that made me go numb.

LABEL: 0x1DFA
STRING: I looked beside me.

LABEL: 0x1E32
STRING: There was Ayume, and her eyes were glued to the stage.

LABEL: 0x1E92
STRING: The look was something I had never seen before...

LABEL: 0x1ED8
STRING: She looked like an innocent girl whose face lit up when she saw something she liked.

LABEL: 0x1F77
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x1F87
STRING: How do you like it? It's amazing, isn't it? This feeling - it's very captivating.

LABEL: 0x1FF0
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x2000
STRING: I wanted you to know this, too. ...To you who fell in love with me.

LABEL: 0x206E
STRING: Those words would have made my heart soar.

LABEL: 0x20C8
STRING: It was proof that she thought of me as someone special.

LABEL: 0x2124
STRING: But... why?

LABEL: 0x215E
STRING: I now felt some sort of distance with Ayume.

LABEL: 0x21C0
STRING: She was physically beside me, but it felt like she and I were in different worlds.

LABEL: 0x2223
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x2233
STRING: Exhilaration flows through your whole body. That feeling of conclusion... Once you feel it, you can't go back.

LABEL: 0x22C2
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x22D2
STRING: Itarou, I'm far too different from you. That's why we can't be together.

LABEL: 0x2344
STRING: So that's why.

LABEL: 0x2378
STRING: My love must end here.

LABEL: 0x240B
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x241B
STRING: This will be the first and last time. Thank you, Itarou.

LABEL: 0x248A
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x249A
STRING: ...Hey. I'm not lying about my gratitude.

LABEL: 0x24F5
STRING: The voices from the audience grew louder.

LABEL: 0x2533
STRING: It would have been too hard to hear Ayume's voice, but I heard it clearly.

LABEL: 0x25AF
STRING: I pushed down the urge rising within me, and I gave a small laugh back.

LABEL: 0x260F
STRING: I now had a cherished memory of spending time with her.

LABEL: 0x2659
STRING: Goodbye, my long sought for girlfriend.

LABEL: 0x2695
STRING: I quietly put a lid on my love.
